# Firearms Forensic Testing Services

**Tender Number and Details**
-----------------------------

* **Reference Number:** cb-743-55796394
* **Solicitation Number:** M4500-4-1898
* **Publication Date:** 2023-12-07
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2024-01-11 13:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date:** 2024-01-11

**Summary**
-----------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) issues an Invitation to Tender (ITT) for the provision of Firearms Forensic Testing Services. The services required include firearms testing and analysis on an as-and-when required basis.

**Contract Period and Start Date**
---------------------------------

The contract period will be for one year from the date of contract award with an option to extend for up to one additional year at the discretion of the RCMP. The anticipated start date is March 1, 2024.

**Security Requirement**
----------------------

RCMP Enhanced Reliability Status clearance is required for all personnel involved in the contract.

**Key Details**
--------------

* **Trade Agreements:** Eligible bidders must be certified under at least one of the following trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive open bidding.
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Price (bidder with the lowest price will be awarded the contract).
* **Delivery Regions:** New Brunswick.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* **Name:** Bruce Coleman
* **Email:** bruce.coleman@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 574-4930

**Tender Documents**
---------------------

The ITT document, including all terms and conditions, is available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26965/202401898-rfp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26965/202401898-rfp_en.pdf) (English) or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26965/202401898-rfp_fr.pdf](
